laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Genetic testing for RB1 gene mutation
laboratory_examinations.findings: g.153211T/H11022A (p.Tyr606X) mutation was found in the RB1 gene.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Dropped to counting fingers by 1985, to 0.25 in 1988, and further decreased to light perception by November 1994.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Varied between 12 and 15 mmHg until end of 1991, rose to 28 mmHg in August 1992, 20 mmHg in January 1993, and 17 mmHg in November 1993.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased gradually over time, peaking at 43 mmHg by the end of February 1995.
